name: places/ChIJFV-w7JVYwokRh-qsOUA2zYc
adrFormatAddress: 1080 5th Ave # 1b, New York, NY 10128-0102, USA

originalText.text: I can't say enough good things about Dr. Sterry and his team (Meagan and Alex were a joy to work with!). They were friendly, caring, professional, and so good at their work. I had a mini neck lift (single chin incision) and a chin implant, and I could not be happier with the results. I look 10 years younger! The Dr. met with me 3 times before the surgery, which I thought was so generous. I never felt rushed or pushed to decide whether I was going to do surgery and which one, but he thought and guided me about my best options and months later, I had decided. After surgery, I bruised a lot, but the doctor was always available to answer any concerns I had and saw me in several appointments after to make sure everything was going well. I HIGHLY recommend them!

originalText.text: I had the loveliest experience with Dr.Sterry & his team! He’s an absolute professional in the sense where he’ll be completely honest about his opinion while still tending to your needs at the same time. I never had filler before and am absolutely glad my first time was with him! Would 100% recommend.

originalText.text: As a nurse who works with many surgeons, I can say with confidence that Dr. Sterry is an artist of his craft. He and his team are attentive, responsive, and truly give you the feeling that they care about your journey from pre-operative to post-operative care. I’m very happy with my results and I would highly recommend him to any of my family or friends seeking a cosmetic procedure.

text.text: As a nurse who works with many surgeons, I can say with confidence that Dr. Sterry is an artist of his craft. He and his team are attentive, responsive, and truly give you the feeling that they care about your journey from pre-operative to post-operative care. I’m very happy with my results and I would highly recommend him to any of my family or friends seeking a cosmetic procedure.

originalText.text: I could never find enough words to explain how an amazing doctor and human Dr. Sterry is. I found him through another review and she was spot on. He went above and beyond my expectations and I had a unique revision case that other doctors refused to take on. He even met at his office on a Sunday to address a little concern I had. I have never seen any doctor do that for a patient. My only regret is not finding him sooner to do it right the first time around.

text.text: I could never find enough words to explain how an amazing doctor and human Dr. Sterry is. I found him through another review and she was spot on. He went above and beyond my expectations and I had a unique revision case that other doctors refused to take on. He even met at his office on a Sunday to address a little concern I had. originalText.text: I got a breast augmentation from Dr.Sterry in February. I felt comfortable from the very beginning. I was in control and never felt pressured to get more done or to go bigger or smaller. I had complete trust in his opinions and I appreciated his transparency with the risks and expectations. The entire staff was friendly and knowledgeable. It’s been 8 months and I couldn’t be happier with my results. It’s exactly what I wanted and the communication after my procedure was great. I felt cared for and comfortable. I would definitely recommend Dr.Sterry and his staff!
